text: A Farewell to Arms is a 1957 World War I romantic drama movie. It was directed by Charles Vidor. The movie is based on novel of the same name by Ernest Hemmingway. It is a remake of the 1932 movie of the same name. It stars Rock Hudson, Jennifer Jones, Vittorio De Sica, and Elaine Stritch. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. The movie was nominated for an Academy Award in 1958. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1957 war movies Category:1957 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:World War I movies Category:Movies based on books Category:American movie remakes Category:Movies directed by John Huston Category:Movies directed by Charles Vidor Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in Italy
title: A Farewell to Arms (1957 movie)
